org.spongepowered.api.util.command

Interface CommandCallable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommandCompleter
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommandService, Dispatcher
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleCommandService, SimpleDispatcher

    public interface CommandCallable
extends CommandCompleter
    A command that can be executed.

    Implementations are not required to implement a sane Object.equals(Object) but may choose to do so.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.util.command.completion.CommandCompleter

        getSuggestions

    • Method Detail

      • call

        boolean call(CommandSource source,
             java.lang.String arguments,
             java.util.List<java.lang.String> parents)
      throws CommandException
        Execute the command based on input arguments.

        The implementing class must perform the necessary permission checks.

        Parameters:
        source - The caller of the command
        arguments - The raw arguments for this command
        parents - A stack of parent commands, where the first entry is the root command
        Returns:
        Whether a command was processed
        Throws:
        CommandException - Thrown on a command error

      • testPermission

        boolean testPermission(CommandSource source)
        Test whether this command can probably be executed by the given source.

        If implementations are unsure if the command can be executed by the source, true should be returned. Return values of this method may be used to determine whether this command is listed in command listings.

        Parameters:
        source - The caller of the command
        Returns:
        Whether permission is (probably) granted

      • getShortDescription

        com.google.common.base.Optional<java.lang.String> getShortDescription()
        Get a short one-line description of this command.
        Returns:
        A description, if available

      • getHelp

        com.google.common.base.Optional<java.lang.String> getHelp()
        Get a longer help text about this command.
        Returns:
        A help text, if available

      • getUsage

        java.lang.String getUsage()
        Get the usage string of this command.

        A usage string may look like [-w &lt;world&gt;] &lt;var1&gt; &lt;var2&gt;.

        Returns:
        A usage string
